publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6944 Roseanna Cunningham: The Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park Designation, Transitional and Consequential Provisions (Scotland) Order 2002 Modification Order 2010â€”That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the Loch Lomond and The Trossachs National Park Designation, Transitional and Consequential Provisions (Scotland) Order 2002 Modification Order 2010 be approved.
